channel.title: The Jennifer Caress Horror Podcast
channel.description:
Actors and voice-over artists read the short stories of Jennifer Caress-- far better than she ever could-- including the Perverted Realities series.Hosted by Iliad Strange, a character straight out of Dragging Wings.
Contents: horror, dark fantasy, and just plain odd material.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Inside the twisted mind of a dark writer
channel.itunes:author: Jennifer Caress
channel.itunes:summary:
Actors and voice-over artists read the short stories of Jennifer Caress-- far better than she ever could-- including the Perverted Realities series.Hosted by Iliad Strange, a character straight out of Dragging Wings.
Contents: horror, dark fantasy, and just plain odd material.

item.title: Talking with author John Prescott, author of Hell
item.description: Hear the promotion for my new novel, The Return of Spring-Heeled Jack, and listen to the third chapter of John Prescott's newest novel, Hell! Music: "News of Sorrow" by Kevin Macleod.
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary:
Hear the promotion for my new novel, The Return of Spring-Heeled Jack, and listen to the third chapter of John Prescott's newest novel, Hell!
Music: "News of Sorrow" by Kevin Macleod.

item.title: Author Charles Day, Legend of the Pumpkin Thief!
item.description: Charles Day, author of the newly released YA novel __Legend of the Pumpkin Thief__ and his wicked sidekick, The Evil Jester, stop by to say hello and talk about the new book! Charles is a lot of fun and this is one interview you're sure to enjoy. :) Also, if you're looking for a fun new drinking game, take a swig every time I say the word "awesome" and see how long it takes for you to black out. Pick up a copy: (https://www.nobleyoungadult.com/Books/382/The-Legend-of-the-Pumpkin-Thief) MUSIC BY Kevin Macleod!
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary:
Charles Day, author of the newly released YA novel __Legend of the Pumpkin Thief__ and his wicked sidekick, The Evil Jester, stop by to say hello and talk about the new book! Charles is a lot of fun and this is one interview you're sure to enjoy. :)
Also, if you're looking for a fun new drinking game, take a swig every time I say the word "awesome" and see how long it takes for you to black out.
Pick up a copy: (https://www.nobleyoungadult.com/Books/382/The-Legend-of-the-Pumpkin-Thief)
MUSIC BY Kevin Macleod!

item.title: Discussion with Certified Hypnotist, Elias Caress
item.description: Hypnosis is a door into our subconscious minds, which is why I've always found it fascinating. Here is a conversation with my brother, certified hypnotist, Elias Caress. www.eliascaress.com
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary:
Hypnosis is a door into our subconscious minds, which is why I've always found it fascinating. Here is a conversation with my brother, certified hypnotist, Elias Caress.
www.eliascaress.com

item.title: Loren Rhoads Ghost Story!
item.description: Happy Halloween everyone! As we conclude this beautiful month October, I want to thank all the authors for contributing their ghost stories. But because I love a good scary tale I just can't make myself close the door on this, so if you have a paranormal story, don't keep it to yourself! Send it to me and I'll share it with our listeners: jennifer@jennifersghost.com Now here is Loren Rhoads true tale about her friend Blair. :-) Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary:
Happy Halloween everyone! As we conclude this beautiful month October, I want to thank all the authors for contributing their ghost stories. But because I love a good scary tale I just can't make myself close the door on this, so if you have a paranormal story, don't keep it to yourself! Send it to me and I'll share it with our listeners: jennifer@jennifersghost.com
Now here is Loren Rhoads true tale about her friend Blair. :-) Enjoy!

item.title: P.S. Gifford's Ghost Story!
item.description: Author P.S. Gifford's childhood encounter with a haunted house and its deceased occupants.
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary: Author P.S. Gifford's childhood encounter with a haunted house and its deceased occupants.

item.title: JG Fahrety's Ghostly Tale!
item.description: During this most sacred month of October, I am bringing you as many ghost stories as I can gather! Fact or fiction, if you've got a ghostly encounter, share it with the rest of us. Contact me at jennifer[at]jennifersghost.com. Here is author JG Faherty's true tale of a childhood encounter!
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary:
During this most sacred month of October, I am bringing you as many ghost stories as I can gather! Fact or fiction, if you've got a ghostly encounter, share it with the rest of us. Contact me at jennifer[at]jennifersghost.com.
Here is author JG Faherty's true tale of a childhood encounter!

item.title: Featuring Guest Writer Lawrence Santoro: So Many Tiny Mouths
item.description: We are treated to guest writer, Lawrence Santoro reading his uber scary story, So Many Tiny Mouths! Find Mr. Santoro on Facebook and tell him what a great job he did :-)
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary: We are treated to guest writer, Lawrence Santoro reading his uber scary story, So Many Tiny Mouths! Find Mr. Santoro on Facebook and tell him what a great job he did :-)

item.description: A great conversation with Evil Jester's Peter Giglio! www.petergiglio.com http://eviljesterpress.lefora.com/ Music by Kevin Macleod

item.title: Conversation with an Editor
item.description: Listen in while I crack the mind of editor and horror writer Hollie Snider. That's right, editors are people, too. ;-P *~*Music: "Ether Disco" by Kevin Macleod*~*
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary:
Listen in while I crack the mind of editor and horror writer Hollie Snider. That's right, editors are people, too. ;-P
*~*Music: "Ether Disco" by Kevin Macleod*~*

item.title: Guest Starring Paolo and Petero! (Actually, It's Just Peter)
item.description: Today I am honored to have guest writers Paolo Mateo and Peter Giglio. Paolo reads his brilliant poem, "Death by Sentry's Cue." And Peter Giglio reads his short story "The Power of Words", which will be featured in the upcoming anthology Live and Let Undead, edited by Hollie Snider. I'll be interviewing him in a later episode! www.petergiglio.com I kindly remind you all that each work is copyrighted, all rights reserved, and only the lowest douche would steal someone's work.
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary:
Today I am honored to have guest writers Paolo Mateo and Peter Giglio. Paolo reads his brilliant poem, "Death by Sentry's Cue." And Peter Giglio reads his short story "The Power of Words", which will be featured in the upcoming anthology Live and Let Undead, edited by Hollie Snider. I'll be interviewing him in a later episode!
www.petergiglio.com
I kindly remind you all that each work is copyrighted, all rights reserved, and only the lowest douche would steal someone's work.

item.title: Dark Continents Publishing Interview
item.description: The creative forces behind Dark Continents Publishing talk about South Park, Star Wars, Steampunk, Splatterpunk, small press, ebooks, Borders, and a little thing I like to call horror. We had a lot of laughs and I thank Mr. Youngquist, Mr. Chamberlain, and Mr. Prescott for joining me from all over the world. :) And because we were all meeting from 4 different places on the planet, life does occasionally interrupt the broadcast: one can hear a vacuum in the background during a small section, my dog barks at ghosts, and one can hear me typing notes as we go along. Sorry about that. I forgot that sound travels. It was great fun and again I thank everyone very much for joining me. :) _*_*_Music by Kevin Macleod via incompetech.com_*_*_
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary:
The creative forces behind Dark Continents Publishing talk about South Park, Star Wars, Steampunk, Splatterpunk, small press, ebooks, Borders, and a little thing I like to call horror. We had a lot of laughs and I thank Mr. Youngquist, Mr. Chamberlain, and Mr. Prescott for joining me from all over the world. :)
And because we were all meeting from 4 different places on the planet, life does occasionally interrupt the broadcast: one can hear a vacuum in the background during a small section, my dog barks at ghosts, and one can hear me typing notes as we go along. Sorry about that. I forgot that sound travels.
It was great fun and again I thank everyone very much for joining me. :)
_*_*_Music by Kevin Macleod via incompetech.com_*_*_

item.title: Blood of the Broken Interview
item.description: This interview with actor Max Sage was conducted approximately 16 hours before his body was discovered. Postmortem DNA tests revealed that Max was responsible for the murder of Phaedra Michelle Cornigan. It is suspected that further testing will reveal his implication in several more murders.
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary: This interview with actor Max Sage was conducted approximately 16 hours before his body was discovered. Postmortem DNA tests revealed that Max was responsible for the murder of Phaedra Michelle Cornigan. It is suspected that further testing will reveal his implication in several more murders.

item.title: Guest Starring Peter Joseph Swanson!
item.description: On this episode, we have a very special guest. He is an amazingly talented author who is reading from his fantasy novel, Merlin's Charge. :)
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary: On this episode, we have a very special guest. He is an amazingly talented author who is reading from his fantasy novel, Merlin's Charge. :)

item.title: Q&A Part 2
item.description: Welcome back. I am your host, Angelica, and we are here with a caller who claims to be a demon. For those of you just tuning in, a gentleman called in last week and introduced himself as a demon. We had a rather interesting conversation, had a lot of callers and a lot of feedback from the show so we asked him back again this week. Music used in this podcast is from Soundjay.com (http://www.soundjay.com/free-music-6.html). All else is copyrighted 2010 to Jennifer Caress. Many thanks to the actors who contributed to this podcast. A special big thanks for working for free. :)
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Caress
item.itunes:summary:
Welcome back. I am your host, Angelica, and we are here with a caller who claims to be a demon. For those of you just tuning in, a gentleman called in last week and introduced himself as a demon. We had a rather interesting conversation, had a lot of callers and a lot of feedback from the show so we asked him back again this week.
Music used in this podcast is from Soundjay.com (http://www.soundjay.com/free-music-6.html). All else is copyrighted 2010 to Jennifer Caress. Many thanks to the actors who contributed to this podcast. A special big thanks for working for free. :)
